Title: The Immortals
Plot: The NCIS team investigates when a seaman's body is found at the bottom of the sea in his dress whites, with a ceremonial sword.  They discover that he was addicted to a MMORPG. Now, the team must figure out how involved he was in the game and how far he would go to get revenge on his arch enemy, another sailor.
GuestStars: Mark Sivertsen, Kieran Mulroney, Julian Bailey, Brooks Almy, Elizabeth Morehead, David Andriole, Yvonne Delarosa
